name: Math-C
description:
Math-C is a math game whose goal is to improve your ability to solve calculations mentally.

x - +

Count on several game modes that will help you with each type of calculation separately:

  • Multiplication 
  • Addition
  • Subtraction
  • Multiplication  and Addition
  • Multiplication and Subtraction
  • Addition and Subtraction

x - +

Control the time of the counter, as well as how it should work
